cause.description:
We do this by enabling people around the world to help plant fruit trees in developing countries. Each tree protects the environment and provides a low-cost, self-renewing source of food for a large number of people.
Our activities include three elements: education, health and environment.
http://www.treesforlife.org
1. I accept the responsibility to acquire the tools of knowledge.
2. I pledge to use these tools for the benefit of my planet and all its inhabitants.
3. I make a commitment to share my knowledge with others.
cause.mission: Trees for Life empowers people by demonstrating that in helping each other, we can unleash extraordinary power that impacts our lives.
cause.name: Trees for Life
